long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will make it possible for you to comment on any netflix episode of your favorite TV shows.

Just go onto any episode and click the extension icon in the bar. The comment section will pop out and you will be able to read other people's opinions and share your own.

Everything without registration!
